hiss.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to say something in a loud whisper
hiss.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She hissed at me to be quiet.
hiss.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to make a noise which sounds like ‘ssss’
hiss.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Snakes only hiss when they are afraid.
hiss.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: if a crowd hisses a speaker, they interrupt them with angry sounds to show that they do not like them
hiss.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: He was booed and hissed during a stormy meeting.
